mapper.select: SELECT insuranceName from RegisterInsurance where insuranceName = #{insuranceName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RegisterInsurance(insuranceID, insuranceName, insuranceType, StandardFee, specialContract, longTerm, applyCondition, compensateCondition, explanation) VALUES(#{insuranceID}, #{insuranceName}, #{insuranceType}, #{standardFee}, #{specialContract}, #{longTerm}, #{applyCondition}, #{compensateCondition}, #{explanation})
